name: Sneaking and Squeaking (LD37)
description:
Escape from little Timmy's room and return to your beloved! In this 3D platformer, you play as Sir Nibbles, a mouse who has been KIDNAPPED! and HELD CAPTIVE! by a young human. You must run, jump, climb, and float through Timmy's bedroom in order to get to the little hole in the wall where your mouse fiancée lives.

Controls:

WASD - Move character

Shift - Sprint

Mouse - Look

Space - Jump

E - Interact

Alternate Controls (Scene View):

WASD - Move character

Mouse - Look

Q & E - Up and down

Shift - Go faster
